Html: How do i make an .exe file to get alvar to run. I have the sdk and everything for it. i am on the last part where it says to build Alvar.sln.bat but theres a problem.

You don't need an .exe of ALVAR. You only need its alvar120.dll and alvarplatform120.dll, and cv100.dll, cvaux100.dll, cvcam100.dll, cxcore100.dll, highgui100.dll, and libguide40.dll from the OpenCV 1.0 installation. Then just run Tutorial 8. You don't need to create an .exe from Alvar.sln since it already has dlls for you to use.

Ohan
Ok, thanks, but i only have Alvar120.dll and alvarplatform120.dll
Nevermind, i have it. Thanks For Helping.
